bibl.title: Gold Mining in Early Ptolemaic Egypt.
bibl.note: The first campaign in the Samut district of the Eastern Desert took place in January 2014. Two main sites excavated by the French team are a fortress and a mining district. They date back to the beginning of the Ptolemaic Period and their construction is closely linked with the exploitation of gold mines nearby.
